subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Celtic was beaten, 1-0, at home by Maribor of Slovenia and was eliminated on aggregate from the Champions League. Celtic owed its appearance in the playoffs to an administrative error by its previous opponent.
snippet: Celtic was beaten, 1-0, at home by Maribor of Slovenia and was eliminated on aggregate from the Champions League. Celtic owed its appearance in the playoffs to an administrative error by its previous opponent.
